title: Please help guys
body: Hi guys some years my account got taken down from a scammer (click-bait site) and my original name from azuyadr changed to what you are seeing now furthermore my region got changed from eu west to north america how can i recover my region back to eu west region?

replies.body:
In order to have us take a look at your account to see what we can do, we'll need you to submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our account specialists will reach back out as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
